data.eml:eml: New species and records of Cladiopsocus Roesler (Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Psocomorpha: Cladiopsocidae) from Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Obando, Ranulfo González, García Aldrete, Alfonso N., Carrejo, Nancy (2018): New species and records of Cladiopsocus Roesler (Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Psocomorpha: Cladiopsocidae) from Colombia. Zootaxa 4378 (2): 191-223, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.2.2
